title: hinting
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20141128021408/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20141128021408/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Hinting**

Hinting, more accurately called instructing, is a method of specifying how [digital fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20141128021408/http:/typophile.com/wiki/digital%20font) display at small sizes on low-resolution devices, usually for on-screen usage. This is accomplished by providing instructions in the font file that define which pixels are turned on when producing [bitmap](http://web.archive.org/web/20141128021408/http:/typophile.com/wiki/bitmap) images.
